column4: Hi, i installed Python 2.5 version, and then i got message broken packages, 500 packages are now corupted, what to do with Pytnon?
Please help
Hey, help me with teh Python!
Comeon i need to fix the program, so i can finnish programming my program
what distro version are you running?
did you install python from the repos, i.e. sudo apt-get install python ?
i did by double-click
where did you download it from then?
well you had to get it from somewhere, Goshawk is right, it should already be installed
you need to stick with packages for ubuntu feisty only, preferably from official repos
or expect serious breakage
try dpkg --remove
for the python package
do you have any other suggestions?
dpkg --remove --force-depends
that will remove it without removing the other packages, which is dangerous
yes
what do you mean?
to be exact 2.5.1~rc1-0ubuntu3
thanks.
